extension.summary: Movie information from IMDb + ratings from Rotten Tomatoes
extension.description: The Internet Movie Database (IMDb) is a HUGE collection of movie information, this addon will gather this data to populate your movie library. Rotten Tomatoes aggregates the reviews from movie critics and provides a 'TomatoMeter' (percentage of critics who have given the movie a positive review) as well as an Average Rating of the scores awarded by the critics. This addon can collect either of these two values as a replacement for IMDb's, userbase derided, rating.
